title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 508.6 - Financing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 508.6 - Financing

State Regulations

Funds available to the social services districts for
emergency assistance, home relief or other forms of public assistance, shall be
used to finance defense emergency aid when furnished as emergency financial
assistance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
508.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
